  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void buildBefore()
    used by god powers if you want to build before moving
    void buildDome()
    Ask the player if it wants to build a dome or a normal building in the previosly selected cells
    void buildOtherWorker()
    asks if player wants to build with the other worker in certain conditions (Poseidon God power)
    void chooseBuilding​(int[] buildings)
    Ask the player in which of the possible cells it wants the worker to build
    void chooseMovement​(int[] movements)
    Ask the player in which of the possible cells it wants to move the previously selected worker
    void chooseNumberPlayers()
    If there isn't any match on the server, the player is asked to create a new one So this method ask the player how many players it wants this match to have
    void chooseWorker​(int workers)
    Ask the player which of its workers to use in this turn
    void doItAgain​(Message.MessageType moveAgain)
    used if god power allows to move/build again
    javax.swing.JPanel getGodPanel()
    Getter for the right panel that shows the gods of the players
    javax.swing.JPanel getInfoPanel()
    Getter for the upper panel that gives to the player infos on what's happening/what it has to do
    void getName()
    Ask the user the username it wants to use

    shows request of get name

    Getter for the main panel (contening either the text input panel or the island)
